thread.title: Taylor Swift and Miranda Lambert Singing "Little Red Wagon" Together Is All You Need in Life
thread.title_full: Taylor Swift and Miranda Lambert Singing "Little Red Wagon" Together Is All You Need in Life

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Taylor Swift and Miranda Lambert Singing "Little Red Wagon" Together Is All You Need in Life
text:
Share Tweet Pin E-mail Getty Taylor Swift revisited her country past Wednesday night in Greensboro, North Carolina, when she invited Miranda Lambert on stage for a "Little Red Wagon" duet. As you can imagine, it was incredible. At one point, Miranda sat on a throne made of men, presumably none of whom were allowed to ride in her little red wagon. Later, Miranda tweeted that Taylor is an inspiring "badass" and her show was "amazing," all of which is correct. In a dream world, they'd continue this collaboration by recording a "Somethin' Bad"-style duet together. What do you say, Tayranda? (That's their new BFF ship name, obviously.)
